column1: Les différentes parties du paragraphe (5 underscore si trou --> "_____")
You know what? You have a profile that is clearly full of energy. of positive energy. And it’s currently going to waste. You said that you couldn’t dance where you currently are? Yeah, but how about…
? That’s important, too! It’s all a matter of balance in life. I’m sure that you can find a way to entertain yourself while you wait for an opportunity to dance. Be patient.
